Questify is a tool for managing tasks th: Questify is a tool for managing tasks that helps you achieve goals.
Questify is an innovative task managemen: Questify is an innovative task management tool that combines elements of gamification with effective time management. Our goal is to help users achieve their goals by transforming everyday tasks into an exciting adventure.
Questify was born out of a passion for e: Questify was born out of a passion for effective time management and a love for games. We noticed that traditional task management methods often feel boring and do not motivate people to take action. We decided to change this, creating a platform that makes achieving goals an enjoyable experience.
We believe in the power of positive moti: We believe in the power of positive motivation and gamification in achieving goals.
We support continuous personal developme: We support continuous personal development through systematic achievement of small goals.
We promote collaboration and support of: We promote collaboration and support of the community in achieving common goals.
We are a team of enthusiasts who believe: We are a team of enthusiasts who believe in the power of gamification and effective time management. Each of us brings unique experience and perspective, creating together a platform that helps people achieve their goals.
Start your journey with Questify today a: Start your journey with Questify today and discover how enjoyable it can be to achieve goals!
Questify is an innovative task managemen: Questify is an innovative task management tool that combines elements of gamification with effective time management. It helps users achieve goals by transforming everyday tasks into an exciting adventure.
How does the level system work?: How does the level system work?
The level system in Questify is based on: The level system in Questify is based on gaining experience by completing tasks. Each task gives a specific amount of XP, and when the required experience threshold is reached, your level increases.
What are the types of tasks?: What are the types of tasks?
In Questify, we have three main types of: In Questify, we have three main types of tasks: Habits (habits), Dailies (daily tasks) and To Do's (tasks to do). Each type has its own unique features and mechanics.
How does the health and energy system wo: How does the health and energy system work?
Health and energy are key statistics in: Health and energy are key statistics in Questify. Completing tasks costs energy, and some tasks can affect health. It is important to maintain these statistics at the appropriate level.
Can I collaborate with other users?: Can I collaborate with other users?
Yes! Questify offers community features: Yes! Questify offers community features that allow you to collaborate with other users, share tasks, and achieve common goals together.
At this moment, Questify is a single-pla: At this moment, Questify is a single-player game. You can invite your friends to join you in the game, but you cannot collaborate with other users.
How can I report a bug or suggest a new: How can I report a bug or suggest a new feature?
You can do this in two ways: by using th: You can do this in two ways: by using the (Report a bug) or (Report a feature) form available in the footer of the page, or by contacting our support team.
